summary: Building a business website for Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center, a clutch repair shop specializing in truck, bus, and car clutch repairs and leather replacements.
known_issues: Deployed website address https://h5gkc-riaaa-aaaal-qnepa-cai.icp0.io is not working or accessible
Email address suvankar78saha@gmail.com not displaying correctly on deployed website despite being updated in code

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage displaying business name 'Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center' with clear sections for services offered
Display service offerings for truck clutch repair, bus clutch repair, car clutch repair, and clutch leather replacement with descriptions
Embed Google Maps showing shop location using the provided link https://maps.app.goo.gl/QWNQgTdd4EJLymry8
Add contact information section with placeholder fields for phone number, email, and business hours
Apply a professional automotive/mechanical theme with warm, trustworthy colors and clean typography throughout the site
Render generated hero image and service icons as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Verify the deployed canister URL https://h5gkc-riaaa-aaaal-qnepa-cai.icp0.io is accessible and serving the frontend application correctly
Verify dfx.json configuration has correct canister definitions for both frontend and backend with proper source directories
Update the phone number displayed in the ContactSection component (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/p[1]) to show '8013648470'
Update the email address displayed in the ContactSection component at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/p[1] to show 'suvankar78saha@gmail.com'
Update the email address displayed in the ContactSection component to show 'suvankar78saha@gmail.com' and verify it renders correctly in the browser

Rebuild and redeploy the application to the Internet Computer with all existing features intact, ensuring the deployed canister URL https://h5gkc-riaaa-aaaal-qnepa-cai.icp0.io becomes accessible and serves the frontend application correctly

new_feature_requests.summary: Create professional business website showcasing clutch repair services
Display services for truck, bus, and car clutch repair and leather replacement
Embed Google Maps location for shop address
Add contact details and business information
Ensure frontend build output is properly configured for Internet Computer deployment with correct asset canister settings
